Text:
Ääähhh! This like to uninstall Tuneup Utilities!
Don't know what will happen if I let it do. You can find more secure copies of AVG PC Tuneup. At least older ones, working well.
I don't get it...it's TuneUp Utilities but now says AVG PC TuneUp...did they made this software for them or they are owners now? Thanks anyway...
if it is the original copy of avg then why they wrote these comments please tell us, thank you.
It is original copy of avg pc tune up 2013 but i'm just suprised because it's actually new/old TuneUp Utilities...before i had both of them installed...

Well, it is TuneUp Utilities, obviously. I have that and the old AVG PC Tuneup now. And the later is completetly different. I only use it for finetuning my internetconnection. I can't find anything about the change on AVG homesite.
Even though I did not update the software or allow it to connect to the internet, it says the key is not genuine and the same if I use another key.

shit, worked great on me for one of the two hard drives i had, an hdd and an ssd. I formatted the hdd since i didn't need the os on that one, and now trying to install on the ssd. "This key is for another AVG product." FUCK
Good one Senzati - you are way out in front of the rest. Keys are being detected!
It worked fine for a week, now it says I don't have a Genuine Copy of the product.
